element.name: Neck - obliquus capitis inferior muscle
element.action: rotation of head and neck

element.name: Neck - obliquus capitis superior muscle
element.action: extends head and flex head to the ipsilateral side

element.name: Neck - rectus capitis posterior major muscle
element.action: ipsilateral rotation of head and extension

element.name: Neck - rectus capitis posterior minor muscle
element.action: extends the head at the neck, but is now considered to be more of a sensory organ than a muscle

element.name: Face - platysma muscle
element.action: Draws the corners of the mouth inferiorly and widens it (as in expressions of sadness and fright). Also draws the skin of the neck superiorly when teeth are clenched

element.name: Neck - sternocleidomastoid muscle
element.action: Acting alone, tilts head to its own side and rotates it so the face is turned towards the opposite side. Acting together, flexes the neck, raises the sternum and assists in forced inspiration.

element.name: Neck - splenius capitis muscle
element.action: prime mover for head extension; can also allow lateral flexion and rotation of the cervical spine

element.name: Neck - splenius cervicis muscle
element.action: bilaterally: extend the head and neck, unilaterally: lateral flexion to the same side, rotation to the same side

division.name: Suprahyoid
division.group: Muscles of larynx, Extrinsic, Suprahyoid muscles

element.name: Feeder - digastric muscle, facial
element.action: opens the jaw when the masseter and the temporalis are relaxed; elevate hyoid bone to open mouth

element.name: Feeder - digastric muscle, trigeminal
element.action: opens the jaw when the masseter and the temporalis are relaxed

element.name: Feeder - geniohyoid muscle
element.action: carry hyoid bone and the tongue upward during deglutition

element.name: Feeder - stylohyoid muscle
element.action: elevate the hyoid during swallowing

element.name: Feeder - mylohyoid muscle
element.action: raises oral cavity floor, elevates hyoid, depresses mandible

division.name: Infrahyoid/Strap
division.group: Muscles of larynx, Extrinsic, Infrahyoid muscles

element.name: Speaker - sternohyoid muscle
element.action: depress hyoid bone

element.name: Speaker - sternothyroid muscle
element.action: elevates larynx, may slightly depress hyoid bone

element.name: Speaker - thyrohyoid muscle
element.action: depresses hyoid bone and elevates the larynx

element.name: Speaker - omohyoid muscle
element.action: Depresses the larynx and hyoid bone. Carries hyoid bone backward and to the side

element.name: Neck - longus capitis muscle
element.nerves: nerve to longus capitis and longus colli muscles
element.action: flexion of neck at atlanto-occipital joint

element.name: Neck - longus colli muscle
element.nerves: nerve to longus capitis and longus colli muscles
element.action: flexes the neck and head

element.name: Neck - rectus capitis anterior muscle
element.action: flexion of neck at atlanto-occipital joint

element.name: Neck - rectus capitis lateralis muscle
element.action: sidebend at atlanto-occipital joint, takes care of flexing the neck

element.name: Neck - scalenus anterior muscle
element.nerves: nerve to scalene and levator scapulae muscles
element.action: C5, C6, elevates first rib, rotate the neck to the opposite side

element.name: Neck - scalenus medius muscle
element.nerves: nerve to scalene and levator scapulae muscles
element.action: C3, C4, C5, C6, C7, C8, elevate 1st rib, laterally flex (bend) the neck to the same side

element.name: Neck - scalenus posterior muscle
element.nerves: nerve to scalene and levator scapulae muscles
element.action: C6, C7, C8, elevate 2nd rib, tilt the neck to the same side
